responses.body:
{
  "status": "true",
  "message": "Login success",
  "data": {
    "email": "{{body 'email'}}",
    "full_name": "Demo",
    "phone_number": "+19876543211",
    "profileSignedUrl": "{{faker 'image.url'}}",
    "token": "eyJraWQiOiJxUzQ2bHhTSTc1MnFKSGFlQlVFa0FyS25vOXg2aWc3K0lxMkljUVFYWmhRPSIsImFsZyI6IlJTMjU2In0.eyJzdWIiOiI5Y",
    "access_token": "{{faker 'datatype.number' min=1 max=25}}|{{faker 'random.alphaNumeric' 25}}",
    "refresh_token": "{{faker 'datatype.number' min=1 max=25}}|{{faker 'random.alphaNumeric' 25}}"
  },
  "error": null
}
responses.label: Success Response
When email or password is not provided
Email not found
Incorrect password

responses.body:
{
  "status": "true",
  "message": "User created",
  "data": {
    "email": "{{body 'email'}}",
    "full_name": "{{body 'full_name'}}",
    "phone_number": "{{body 'phone_no'}}",
    "profileSignedUrl": "{{faker 'image.url'}}",
    "token": "eyJraWQiOiJxUzQ2bHhTSTc1MnFKSGFlQlVFa0FyS25vOXg2aWc3K0lxMkljUVFYWmhRPSIsImFsZyI6IlJTMjU2In0.eyJzdWIiOiI5Y",
    "access_token": "{{faker 'datatype.number' min=1 max=25}}|{{faker 'random.alphaNumeric' 25}}",
    "refresh_token": "{{faker 'datatype.number' min=1 max=25}}|{{faker 'random.alphaNumeric' 25}}"
  },
  "error": null
}
